entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
